mapper.sql: INS_ARCHIVE_ID, INS_ARCHIVE_SOCIAL_NUMBER, INS_ARCHIVE_FUND_NUMBER, INS_ARCHIVE_PR_NUMBER, INS_ARCHIVE_PR_PERSON_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_PR_PERSON_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_PR_FIRM_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_PR_FIRM_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_MD_NUMBER, INS_ARCHIVE_MD_PERSON_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_MD_PERSON_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_MD_FIRM_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_MD_FIRM_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_UN_NUMBER, INS_ARCHIVE_UN_PERSON_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_UN_PERSON_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_UN_FIRM_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_UN_FIRM_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_OC_NUMBER, INS_ARCHIVE_OC_PERSON_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_OC_PERSON_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_OC_FIRM_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_OC_FIRM_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_GI_NUMBER, INS_ARCHIVE_GI_PERSON_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_GI_PERSON_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_GI_FIRM_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_GI_FIRM_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_FU_NUMBER, INS_ARCHIVE_FU_PERSON_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_FU_PERSON_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_FU_FIRM_PROP, INS_ARCHIVE_FU_FIRM_SUM, INS_ARCHIVE_NAME, INS_ARCHIVE_STAFF_NAME, INS_ARCHIVE_DEPT_NAME, INS_ARCHIVE_POST_NAME, INS_ARCHIVE_INSURED_NAME, INS_ARCHIVE_INSURED_MONTH, INS_ARCHIVE_SALARY_MONTH, INS_ARCHIVE_SOCIAL_PERSON_PAY, INS_ARCHIVE_SOCIAL_FIRM_PAY, INS_ARCHIVE_FUND_PERSON_PAY, INS_ARCHIVE_FUND_FIRM_PAY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_TIME, REVISION, IS_DELETED
mapper.select: select INS_ARCHIVE_NAME from INSURED_ARCHIVE where IS_DELETED=0 GROUP BY INS_ARCHIVE_NAME,to_date(to_char(INS_ARCHIVE_SALARY_MONTH,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY to_date(to_char(INS_ARCHIVE_SALARY_MONTH,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM') desc
